attributes.action: to please allow graduates of top universities status from developing world such as scientist,who have lived here continuously for over five years working and paying taxes granted work permits to practice and remain,as they constitute as assets to the economy and not liabilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As most of this top graduates who are in britain are good law abiding citizens,working and contributing taxes to the british economy.if they are given the opportunity to effectively use their expertise to support Britain.
